mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ACTUATOR_GREENHOUSE_COMPLEX_G"( idx_actuator_gh_complex_g, daqtime, roofwindow_l1, roofwindow_l2, roofwindow_l3, roofwindow_r1, roofwindow_r2, roofwindow_r3, outcurtain, incurtain, idx_user ) VALUES ( ACTUATOR_GH_COMPLEX_G_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TO_DATE(#{daqtime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{roofwindow_l1}, #{roofwindow_l2}, #{roofwindow_l3}, #{roofwindow_r1}, #{roofwindow_r2}, #{roofwindow_r3}, #{outcurtain}, #{incurtain}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )

INSERT INTO "ACTUATOR_GREENHOUSE_GLASS"( idx_actuator_gh_glass, daqtime, roofwindow_l, roofwindow_r, outcurtain, incurtain, idx_user ) VALUES ( ACTUATOR_GH_GLASS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TO_DATE(#{daqtime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{roofwindow_l}, #{roofwindow_r}, #{outcurtain}, #{incurtain}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "ACTUATOR_GREENHOUSE_SINGLE_G"( idx_actuator_gh_single_g, daqtime, outsidewindow_l, outsidewindow_r, insidewindow_l, insidewindow_r, curtain_l, curtain_r, sidescreen_l, sidescreen_r, idx_user ) VALUES ( ACTUATOR_GH_SINGLE_G_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TO_DATE(#{daqtime},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{outsidewindow_r}, #{outsidewindow_l}, #{insidewindow_l}, #{insidewindow_r}, #{curtain_l}, #{curtain_r}, #{sidescreen_l}, #{sidescreen_r}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "NOW_GREENHOUSE_COMPLEX_S"( idx_now_gh_complex_s, temp, hum, light, co2, soiltension, soilph, soilmoisture, soilec, soiltemp, pos_roofwindow_l, pos_roofwindow_r, pos_outcurtain, pos_incurtain, idx_user
) VALUES ( NOW_GH_COMPLEX_S_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{temp}, #{hum}, #{light}, #{co2}, #{soiltension}, #{soilph}, #{soilmoisture}, #{soilec}, #{soiltemp}, #{pos_roofwindow_l}, #{pos_roofwindow_r}, #{pos_outcurtain}, #{pos_incurtain}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )

INSERT INTO "NOW_GREENHOUSE_GLASS"( idx_now_gh_glass, temp, hum, light, co2, soiltension, soilph, soilmoisture, soilec, soiltemp, pos_roofwindow_l, pos_roofwindow_r, pos_outcurtain, pos_incurtain, idx_user ) VALUES ( NOW_GH_GLASS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{temp}, #{hum}, #{light}, #{co2}, #{soiltension}, #{soilph}, #{soilmoisture}, #{soilec}, #{soiltemp}, #{pos_roofwindow_l}, #{pos_roofwindow_r}, #{pos_outcurtain}, #{pos_incurtain}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "NOW_GREENHOUSE_SINGLE_S"( idx_now_gh_single_s, temp, hum, light, co2, soiltension, soilph, soilmoisture, soilec, soiltemp, pos_roofwindow_l, pos_roofwindow_r, pos_outcurtain, pos_incurtain, idx_user ) VALUES ( NOW_GH_SINGLE_S_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{temp}, #{hum}, #{light}, #{co2}, #{soiltension}, #{soilph}, #{soilmoisture}, #{soilec}, #{soiltemp}, #{pos_roofwindow_l}, #{pos_roofwindow_r}, #{pos_outcurtain}, #{pos_incurtain}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "NOW_WEATHER"( IDX_NOW_WEATHER, TEMP, HUM, INSOLATION, WINDDIRECTION, WINDSPEED, RAINDETECT, idx_user ) VALUES ( NOW_WEATHER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{temp}, #{hum}, #{insolation}, #{winddirection}, #{windspeed}, #{raindetect}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_DCMOTOR"( IDX_VERDATA_DCMOTOR, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, AMPERE, STANDARDTOUQUE, TORQUE, RPM, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_DCMOTOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{ampere}, #{standardtouque}, #{torque}, #{rpm}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_DUST"( IDX_VERDATA_DUST, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, TESTTIME, METHOD, ONTIME, OFFTIME, REPEATCOUNT, DURINGTIME, idx_user
) VALUES ( VD_DUST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{testtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{method}, #{ontime}, #{offtime}, #{repeatcount}, #{duringtime}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_ECSENSOR"( IDX_VERDATA_ECSENSOR, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, F_TEMP, F_HUM, STANDARDVALUE, VERIFYVALUE, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_ECSENSOR_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{f_temp}, #{f_hum}, #{standardvalue}, #{verifyvalue}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_HOTSHOCK_ROBOT"( IDX_VERDATA_HOTSHOCK_ROBOT, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, TEMP, HUM, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_HOTSHOCK_ROBOT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{temp}, #{hum}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_MATERIAL_BIG"( IDX_VERDATA_MATERIAL_BIG, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, WEIGHT, STRENGTH, DISPLACEMENT, ELONGATION, ELONGATIONRATE, YIELDPOINT, BREAKINGPOINT, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_MATERIAL_BIG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{weight}, #{strength}, #{displacement}, #{elongation}, #{elongationrate}, #{yieldpoint}, #{breakingpoint}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username})
)

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_WATERPROOF_ROBOT"( IDX_VERDATA_WATERPROOF_ROBOT, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, WATERPRESSURE, PLATESPEED, NOZZLESWINGSPEED, WATERSUPPLYMOTORSPEED, WATERFLOWQUANTITY, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_WATERPROOF_ROBOT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{waterpressure}, #{platespeed}, #{nozzleswingspeed}, #{watersupplymotorspeed}, #{waterflowquantity}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_WATERPROOF"( IDX_VERDATA_WATERPROOF, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, WATERPRESSURE, PLATESPEED, NOZZLESWINGSPEED, WATERSUPPLYMOTORSPEED, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_WATERPROOF_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{waterpressure}, #{platespeed}, #{nozzleswingspeed}, #{watersupplymotorspeed}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )

INSERT INTO "VERIFYDATA_WIND"( IDX_VERDATA_WIND, VERIFYID, DEVICEID, DAQTIME, STANDARDSPEED, VERIFYSPEED, idx_user ) VALUES ( VD_WIND_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{verifyid}, #{deviceid}, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{standardspeed}, #{verifyspeed}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )

INSERT INTO "ENV_GREENHOUSE_SINGLE"( idx_env_gh_single, daqtime, temp, hum, light, co2, soiltension, soilph, soilmoisture, soilec, soiltemp, idx_user ) VALUES ( ENV_GH_SINGLE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, TO_DATE(#{daqtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), #{temp}, #{hum}, #{light}, #{co2}, #{soiltension}, #{soilph}, #{soilmoisture}, #{soilec}, #{soiltemp}, (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE username = #{username}) )
INSERT INTO "TOKEN"( IDX_USER, KEY, CREATED, EXPIRED ) VALUES ( #{idx_user}, #{key}, #{created}, #{expired} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_FAC_JOIN WHERE idx_asset = #{fac} AND idx_user = (SELECT idx_user FROM TOKEN WHERE key = #{key})
